mapper.select: SELECT BID,BNAME,BTITLE,BCONTENT,BDATE,BHIT,BGROUP,BSTEP,BINDENT FROM (SELECT BID,BNAME,BTITLE,BCONTENT,BDATE,BHIT,BGROUP,BSTEP,BINDENT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BGROUP DESC,BSTEP ASC) B_SEQ FROM REPLYBOARD) WHERE B_SEQ BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLYBOARD SET BHIT=BHIT+1 WHERE BID=#{param1}
UPDATE REPLYBOARD SET BSTEP=BSTEP+1 WHERE BGROUP=#{param1} AND BSTEP>#{param2}
